entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a person who is standing on the stairs and watching the pyrotechnical miracles. He is described as yelling with fright when one of the Catherine wheels whirled towards him.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is a person who is standing on the stairs and watching the pyrotechnical miracles. She is described as yelling with fright and telling Filch to hurry when one of the rockets exploded.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is watching the pyrotechnical miracles from afar. He is not directly involved in the scene but is observing what is happening.

entities.name: catherine wheels
entities.description: Catherine wheels are objects that are part of the pyrotechnical miracles and are described as whirling towards Umbridge and Filch.

entities.name: dragons
entities.description: Dragons are objects that are part of the pyrotechnical miracles and are described as taking advantage of the open door to escape towards the second floor.

entities.name: purple bat
entities.description: A purple bat is an object that is part of the pyrotechnical miracles and is described as smoking ominously and escaping towards the second floor.

relationships.description: Umbridge and Filch both yell with fright when one of the Catherine wheels whirled towards them.
Umbridge shouts an instruction to Filch, telling him to hurry.
Umbridge uses a spell to stun one of the rockets, causing it to explode.
